name: It's Out There
description:
After a hike in the woods, a man camps down for the night where he thinks no animal, or person, will find him.

What he doesn't realise is he is standing on the resting grounds of 'it'

This is my first try at making a horror style game, so enjoy!

CONTROLS

Press SPACE to pick up sticks

Press SPACE to put sticks into the fire

As the game progresses less sticks will appear, so be ready

Made in 3 hours!
